theorem-logical.name: Modus Ponens (affirming the consequent)
theorem-logical.comment: assume (P then Q), assume p : conclude Q
theorem-logical.proof: (p implies q), p given (p implies q) and p ??? (-p or q) and p defn of "implies" (-p and p) or (q and p) conjunction distributes over disjunction bot or (q and p) defn of 'bot' q and p contradiction elimination
